description: This Dart source file defines the AppRouter class for managing route navigation in a Flutter application. It sets up route constants, handles route generation with basic authentication guards, and provides utility methods for navigation.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A class that manages route definitions, route generation with guard logic, and navigation helpers for the app.

methods.name: initialRoute
methods.description: Determines the initial route based on the user's authentication status.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes based on route settings, applying authentication guards to protected pages.

methods.name: guardedPushNamed
methods.description: A helper method to navigate to a route only if the user is authenticated; otherwise, redirects to login.
